structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
C RESTRUCTURE OF LOCAL GOVERNMENT IN COUNTY CONTAINING CITY OF FIRST CLASS

law.catch_line: Consolidated local government to have status of county and of city of the first class for the purpose of receiving government aid and grants.
law.text: For the purpose of applying for or receiving any aid or grant-in-aid from the Commonwealth of Kentucky or the government of the United States, a consolidated local government shall be deemed a county and shall be deemed an incorporated city of the first class under the Constitution and general laws of the Commonwealth of Kentucky.
law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 346, sec. 57, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 189, sec. 5, effective July 14, 2000.
